result.execSummary:
The defendant Shyan M. Lipp was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Paid in full - bond previously posted has been applied.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shyan M. Lipp

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
15CM44, 15CM71, 15CM149, 15CM228 Cases called @ 9:21 a.m. Defendant Shyan M. Lipp in court with attorney Ben Szilagyi.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea QN reviewed w/Defendant.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed.  Plea: 15CM44 - NC. 15CM71 - NC. 15CM228: Ct 1 - NC.  Court accepts plea and enters JOC. 15CM228: Cts 2 & 3 - DRI. 15CM149: Cts 1 & 2 - DRI. 15FO139 - DRI. 15FO73 - DRI. Sentencing argument by DA Blader. Sentencing argument by Atty Szilagyi. No statement by DE. Court orders: 15CM44 - Costs w/ 60 DTP or PP. 15CM71 - 30 days WCJ - Huber, GT, 1 day CFTS - I/S - 2 years probation - Conditions: AODA and follow through, defendant must maintain absolute sobriety and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician, Costs to include the DNA surcharge w/ 60 DTP or PP.

 15CM228 - S/W 2 years probation concurrent w/ Ct 1 - Conditions: AODA and follow through, defendant must maintain absolute sobriety and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician, Costs to include the DNA surcharge w/ 60 DTP or PP, DNA sample to be provided. 1 day CFTS. Appeal rights given.

15CM149, 15CM71, 15CM44 & 15FO73 9:05 am cases called. Defendant Shyan M. Lipp in court with attorney Ben Szilagyi.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.    NGP entered.   STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint. Statement by Attorney Szilagyi to set plea/sentencing hearing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 10, 2015 at 09:15 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: BOND ORDERED AS TO BOTH WAUSHARA CO CASE NOS. OF 2015CM000044 AND 2015CM000071.   The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician.   Complete ID process with the Sheriff's Department.

15CM-44 and 15CM-71 - Both Cases Called @ 2:20 PM: Defendant Shyan M. Lipp in court with attorney Ben Szilagyi.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Both Complaints Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Per SPD:  Def wishes to exercise her right to substitution of Judge.  NGP received and entered as to both cases.   Subsequent scheduling once new Judge has been assigned.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within each complaint.
from UW Health - Clinical Social Worker
